Clip.Title: GREENPEACE: THE STORY
Clip.EpisodeSummary: As the world began to view the environmental damage caused by human beings, a determined group gathered in Vancouver to see what they could do about it and the result became the most recognizable group of environmental crusaders on Earth.

Clip.Title: BLACK MAMBA: KISS OF DEATH
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The bite of the black mamba is known by South African locals as the "kiss of death." A single strike can deliver enough neurotoxic venom to kill 15 grown men. It has one of Africa's worst reputations, but does it deserve its bad rap? Behind the bad press lies a mercurial reptile that is quite shy. Follow a female mamba looking for a home to incubate her eggs while avoiding her main enemy: humans. Then join snake bounty hunter Simon Keys, whose black mamba sanctuary offers a unique look at the secret behavior of this much-maligned snake.

Clip.Title: THE BIONIC VET
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The Bionic Vet must perform surgery to save a dog with a groundbreaking operation to replace his foot with a prosthetic and a second dog with a dislocation.

Clip.Title: UNDERSEA EDENS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: At the eastern tip of Papua New Guinea lies a marine paradise made up of 600 remote islands. These distant islands far offshore are surrounded by countless pristine coral reefs. Just beneath the sea - life abounds. With over 1,500 species of fish... every single nook and cranny on the reefs are inhabited and exploited.

Clip.Title: GREENPEACE: THE STORY
Clip.EpisodeSummary: As the world began to view the environmental damage caused by human beings, a determined group gathered in Vancouver to see what they could do about it and the result became the most recognizable group of environmental crusaders on Earth.

Clip.Title: I HAVE SEEN THE EARTH CHANGE
Clip.Episode: Mongolia: A Country Swept By Winds
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The Matriarch of a large Mongolian family of Nomads investigates and reflects on how the rapid changes in weather are impacting her country.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: An aerial survey of world famous Cape Breton Island reveals why this has been called the "world's greatest road trip" - from the Canso Causeway to the Cape Breton Highlands - the island is a world unto its own.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: WARSHIPS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Ride along with a Canadian fleet of Warships as they patrol the Persian Gulf.

Follow a female mamba looking for a home to incubate her eggs while avoiding her main enemy: humans. Clip.Title: AERIAL AMERICA
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From its Great Lakes to its Grand Canyon, its Rocky Mountain peaks to its Key West reefs, America is a land of amazing destinations. This aerial adventure over the nation's most remarkable landscapes and landmarks captures the breathtaking beauty of America, while demonstrating how its sense of wonder has inspired countless artists, thinkers, and revolutionaries.

Clip.Title: AERIAL AMERICA
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From its Great Lakes to its Grand Canyon, its Rocky Mountain peaks to its Key West reefs, America is a land of amazing destinations. This aerial adventure over the nation's most remarkable landscapes and landmarks captures the breathtaking beauty of America, while demonstrating how its sense of wonder has inspired countless artists, thinkers, and revolutionaries.

Clip.Title: THE LOCKERBIE BOMBING
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Before 9/11, this 1988 bombing was the deadliest attack on American civilians. Reveal untold stories from eyewitness accounts and unique eyewitness footage.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From scenic Telegraph Cove, around Cape Scott Provincial Park and beyond - Vancouver Island's Northern Coastline is one of the world's last, great wilderness frontiers.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Vancouver Island's Western Coastline is a collection of scenic towns, parks and coastal rainforest unique in the world - from Tofino, to Pacific Rim National Park Reserve, and Clayoquot Sound UNESCO Biosphere Reserve.

Clip.Title: THE KGB DISSIDENT
Clip.EpisodeSummary: This documentary tells the story of KGB officer Viktor Orekhov who monitored, collected evidence and severely punished the dissidents of the USSR.

Clip.Title: OPERATION MINCEMEAT
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Based on the best-selling book, Operation Mincemeat reveals the most successful deception of World War II that has been shrouded in secrecy for more than sixty years.

Clip.Title: MISSION TO MURDER HITLER
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The operation Valkyrie to kill Hitler was led by German resistance willing to turn traitor to save lives. See how the plot was nearly carried out, through gripping re-enactments, and firsthand interviews from members of the resistance.

Clip.Title: THE KGB DISSIDENT
Clip.EpisodeSummary: This documentary tells the story of KGB officer Viktor Orekhov who monitored, collected evidence and severely punished the dissidents of the USSR.
